alert.note: Alert for Butler (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 24 at 9:43PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Butler County through 1000 PM CDT... At 942 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Naylor, or 11 miles east of Doniphan, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Harviell around 950 PM CDT. Neelyville around 955 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
